txt_en: Failure is the fog through which we glimpse triumph.
txt_cn: 透过失败的迷雾，才能瞥见胜利的光辉。

txt_en: You are free to choose your own path.
txt_cn: 你可以自由地选择自己的道路。

txt_en: The strongest person is the one who isn't scared to be alone.
txt_cn: 世界上最强大的人不惧孤独。

txt_en: Positive thinking initiates more happiness!
txt_cn: 积极的思考带来更多的快乐。

txt_en: Human life is limited, and serving the people is infinite.
txt_cn: 人的生命是有限的，可是为人民服务是无限的。

txt_en: Whatever happens tomorrow, we have had today.
txt_cn: 不管明天会发生什么，至少我们拥有今天。

txt_en: Before finding the right person, the only thing you need to do is to make yourself good enough.
txt_cn: 在找到合适的人之前，你唯一需要做的，就是让自己足够优秀。

txt_en: The most alluring thing a woman can have is confidence.
txt_cn: 女性最有魅力的地方是自信。

txt_en: Food is worth more than gold.
txt_cn: 粮食比黄金更为珍贵。

txt_en: It is always darkest just before the dawn.
txt_cn: 黎明前总是漆黑一片。

txt_en: If you are hopeful, you will be invincible.
txt_cn: 满怀希望，就会所向披靡。

txt_en: Trees give peace to the souls of men.
txt_cn: 树木为人的心灵带来平静。

txt_en: You're never alone when you have books.
txt_cn: 有书作陪，永不寂寞。

txt_en: It is remarkable how similar the pattern of love is to the pattern of insanity.
txt_cn: 爱与疯狂只有一线之隔。

txt_en: Idleness is the root of all evil.
txt_cn: 懒惰乃万恶之源。

txt_en: We all wonder about the path we didn't follow.
txt_cn: 我们都会好奇自己没选的那条路通向何方。

txt_en: Adversity does teach you who your real friends are.
txt_cn: 经历逆境会让你知道谁是真正的朋友。

txt_en: You are the best thing that ever happened to me.
txt_cn: 遇见你是发生在我身上最美好的事情。

txt_en: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
txt_cn: 你每生气一分钟，也就失去了六十秒的幸福。

txt_en: A year's plan starts with spring.
txt_cn: 一年之计在于春。

txt_en: Always take every opportunity that comes your way.
txt_cn: 遇到的一切机会都要抓紧。

txt_en: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
txt_cn: 深入观察大自然，方可更好理解万事。

txt_en: No water, no life.
txt_cn: 水是生命之源。

txt_en: Love knows no race, creed or gender.
txt_cn: 爱不分种族、不分信仰、不分性别。

txt_en: People always prepare for the worst but hope for the best.
txt_cn: 人们总是做好了最坏的打算但仍期望着最美好的结局。

txt_en: Don't be afraid to break the rules.
txt_cn: 不要害怕打破常规。

txt_en: Love is what binds us, through fair or stormy weather.
txt_cn: 爱将我们紧紧相连，共度风雨。

txt_en: They say the important thing in life isn't the destination. It's the journey.
txt_cn: 世人常说，生命中最重要的事并非抵达终点，而是旅途本身。

txt_en: Some things can't be forgotten.
txt_cn: 有些事是刻骨铭心的。

txt_en: Medicines cure diseases but only doctors can cure patients.
txt_cn: 治病可用药石之方，救人唯有医者仁心。
